Filipino(fil):
Magmaneho tayo sa Commonwealth, ikalawa sa pinaka-accident-prone na kalsada sa Metro Manila noong 2021.

Lumipat sa pinakakaliwang lane. Tapos, mag-U-turn pakaliwa.
English(en):
Let's drive through Commonwealth, the second most accident-prone road in Metro Manila in 2021.

Switch to the leftmost lane. Then, make a U-turn to the left.

Filipino(fil): Lumipat sa pinakakaliwang lane at mag-U-turn pakaliwa.
English(en): Switch to the leftmost lane and make a U-turn to the left.

Filipino(fil): Dumiretso hanggang sa dulo ng barriers at bumalik sa motorcycle lane.
English(en): Drive until the end of the barriers and go back to the motorcycle lane.

Filipino(fil): Dumiretso sa dulo at bumalik sa motorcycle lane.
English(en): Drive to the end and go back to the motorcycle lane.

Filipino(fil): Huwag mag-counterflow. Manatili sa tamang linya.
English(en): Do not counterflow. Stay in the correct lane.

REMINDER:
SLOW DOWN BEFORE A U-TURN

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na dahan-dahan lapitan ang U-turn slot.
English(en): Remember to slow down when approaching a U-turn slot.

Filipino(fil): I-signal ang kagustuhang lumiko 25 metro pa lang ang layo sa lilikuan.
English(en): Signal your intent to turn 25 meters away from the turn.

Filipino(fil):
PAALALA:
HUWAG TAGALAN ANG PAGLIPAT NG LANE
English(en):
REMINDER:
DO NOT TAKE TOO LONG TO SWITCH LANES

Filipino(fil): Dahan-dahang lumipat ng lane pero huwag magtagal.
English(en): Carefully switch lanes but do not take too long.

REMINDER:
MOVE TO THE CORRECT LANE

Filipino(fil): Hindi ka nakalipat sa tamang lane.
English(en): You failed to switch to the proper lane.
